job.title: Machine Learning Engineer / Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongMachine Learning Engineer  Data ScientiststrongppClairways is building technologies for smart monitoring of respiratory health 1 in 8 people suffers from a chronic respiratory disease such as asthma COPD or cystic fibrosis and treatment of these diseases currently is hindered by the limited respiratory data available to inform both drug development and disease management decisions Our technologies help obtain this data and improve the health of people living with respiratory diseasesppbrppClairways is seeking a machine learning and data science engineer to support the development of edge machine learning algorithms for our novel wearable respiratory monitor As part of this role the ML engineer will work on the backend data infrastructure as well as pipelines for model generation continuous integration and deployment MLOpsppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliAdvanced degree in computer science math statistics or related disciplineliliStrong programming experience in Python and CCliliHandson experience in on MachineDeep Learning projects specifically with audio andor video dataliliFamiliarity with machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorflowliliExtensive data modeling and data architecture skillsliliGreat communication skills both written and verballiliStrong crossdiscipline collaboration skillsliulpbrppstrongExtrastrongpulliExperience with EdgeMLliliExperience with AWS Cloud Computing Services EC2 S3 Lambda etcliliKnowledge of distributed computing systems like Hadoop amp SparkliliExperience in deployment of machine learning based solutionsliliAudio signal processingliulpbrppstrongLocationstrongpulliLebanon New Hampshire 03766 United StatesliulpbrppstrongWebsitestrongpulliwwwclairwayscomliul
